3.title: Cataclysm is released.
3.desc: The original version of Cataclysm, an Extreme Demon by Ggb0y, is hack-verified and released.

4.title: The first ever Demon List is uploaded.
4.desc: Loogiah uploads the first ever Demon List to the Geometry Dash Forums.

4.title: Geometry Dash Forums are created.
4.desc: The Geometry Dash forums are created.

6.title: Tartarus is verified by Dolphy
6.desc: Riot's top 1 Extreme Demon, Tartarus, is verified by Dolphy.

6.title: Knobbelboy verifies God Eater.
6.desc: Knobbelboy verifies what was once regarded as the best level ever made, God Eater.

8.title: The Hell Zone is released.
8.desc: Sohn0924 releases the first level in his Hell series, The Hell Zone.

9.title: TamaN released Motion.
9.desc: TamaN releases what is now one of the most popular Easy Demons in the game, Motion.

13.title: Trusta verifies Yatagarasu.
13.desc: Trusta verifies the famous Extreme Demon Yatagarasu.

13.title: Serponge releases AlterGame X.
13.desc: Serponge releases the 10th edition to his famous series, AlterGame X.

15.title: Moldy uploads his first YouTube video.
15.desc: Moldy is now a famous Geometry Dash YouTuber.

15.title: The Daily Demon disbands.
15.desc: The famous parody Geometry Dash news source, The Daily Demon, disbands.

16.title: Geometry Dash 2.1 is released on Steam.
16.desc: Geometry Dash 2.1, the eleventh official Geometry Dash update, is released on Steam.

17.title: Nine Circles released by Zobros.
17.desc: Zobros releases his famous 1.9 Hard Demon, Nine Circles.

18.title: Geometry Dash 2.1 is released on iOS, Android, and Amazon.
18.desc: Geometry Dash 2.1, the eleventh official Geometry Dash update, is released on iOS, Android, and Amazon.

18.title: The Gang disbands.
18.desc: The Gang, consisting of Technical, Npesta, Golden, and Gizbro, disbands.

19.title: Today is Viprin's birthday!
19.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, Viprin, was born today in 2000.

21.title: At The Speed Of Light by Dimrain47 is released.
21.desc: Dimrain47 releases the now famous song At The Speed Of Light.

26.title: Riot Announces The Tartarus Verification Race
26.desc: Riot releases Tartarus as an open verification to anyone.

29.title: Xander hacks and releases Zodiac.
29.desc: Xander hack-verifies and releases the top 1 Extreme Demon, Zodiac.

30.title: Geometry Dash 1.5 is released.
30.desc: Geometry Dash 1.5 added the new level Theory of Everything and the UFO game mode.

31.title: Darnoc Releases The First Flappy Bird Level
31.desc: Darnoc releases his level Flappy Bird, using the UFO game mode to recreate the famous game by the same name.

31.title: Today is AeonAir's birthday!
31.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, AeonAir, was born today in 2000.

9.title: Darnoc uploads his last YouTube video.
9.desc: Darnoc, one of the first ever Geometry Dash players, uploads his last video.

9.title: Void Wave is verified and released.
9.desc: Void Wave is a popular Extreme Demon.

10.title: RobTop adds more demon difficulties.
10.desc: RobTop splits the single demon rating into Easy, Medium, Hard, Insane, and Extreme Demon ratings.

10.title: Tartarus is rated on Mullsy's account due to suspicions of Dolphy hacking.
10.desc: After things got resolved, the level got rated on Dolphy's account.

10.title: JonathanGD releases Future Funk II.
10.desc: Future Funk II is a popular, extra-long Geometry Dash demon.

11.title: RobTop reveals the Geometry Dash 2.2 song hint.
11.desc: The hint led to Hinkik's song Explorers. Unfortunately, the level using this song got delayed to 2.21 and did not release in 2.2.

11.title: TheMuteTroll calls out the Geometry Dash community for failing to spot hackers.
11.desc: TheMuteTroll releases a video exposing common techniques players use to hack.

15.title: The Apocalyptic Trilogy by APTeam is completed for the first time.
15.desc: While the level would later recieve many new versions, this was the first official version by APTeam.

15.title: Technical verifies Omega by MindCap.
15.desc: Omega is a popular level by Mindcap.

16.title: Optical starts the Levelution trend.
16.desc: Optical encouraged creators to lower their standards to release more levels for players to play.

17.title: Today is GD Colon's birthday!
17.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, GD Colon, was born today in 2004.

17.title: Npesta verifies Deimos.
17.desc: Deimos is one of many sequels to Phobos.

18.title: Tartarus is unrated on Mullsy's and rerated on Dolphy's account.
18.desc: After Dolphy proved his innocence, he got Tartarus rated on his account.

18.title: Rainstorm crashes at 99% on Zodiac.
18.desc: He was the first person to crash at the very end of the level.

19.title: Knobbelboy verifies Bloodlust.
19.desc: Knobbelboy verifies the top 1 Extreme Demon Bloodlust.

19.title: Juniper uploads her first YouTube video.
19.desc: She is now a famous Geometry Dash YouTuber.

22.title: Platformer mode is previewed.
22.desc: RobTop releases the first ever preview for update 2.2's Platformer mode.

22.title: Combined verifies HyperSonic
22.desc: Combined verifies HyperSonic, the third installment to the Sonic series.

23.title: Today is RobTop's birthday!
23.desc: The Geometry Dash developer, RobTop, was born today in 1987.

24.title: Wulzy releases the first ever Level Swap.
24.desc: Level Swap is a series started by him where creators take turns building different levels.

25.title: Cyclic releases The Hell Zone.
25.desc: The Hell Zone is a remake of a level by the same name. Cyclic's version would eventually lead to him getting exposed.

25.title: Bausha Vortex is verified by JakeSJ.
25.desc: Bausha Vortex is a famous Nine Circles inspired level by Pennutoh.

25.title: Today is SoulsTRK's birthday!
25.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, SoulsTRK, was born today in 1998.

27.title: SuperPizzaLuigi releases Fairydust.
27.desc: SuperPizzaLuigi releases Fairydust, a level that continued the Nine Circles trend started by Zobros.

28.title: Zylenox releases Peaceful.
28.desc: Zylenox releases Peaceful, a horror level finished by him.

10.title: Bloodbath gets its first ever 60 Hz victor.
10.desc: DiamondDark/Jaeger becomes the first ever 60 Hz victor of Bloodbath.

12.title: Rampage verifies Quantum Processing by Riot.
12.desc: Rampage verifies Riot's Blast Processing inspired Extreme Demon, Quantum Processing.

13.title: Manix quits Geometry Dash.
13.desc: Manix announces he is quitting Geometry Dash and he cancels Fusion Z.

14.title: Technical verifies Photovoltaic II by Mazl.
14.desc: Technical verifies the Extreme Demon Photovoltaic II.

15.title: Luqualizer verifies Northernsense by Electro2001.
15.desc: Luqualizer verifies the Extreme Demon Northernsense.

16.title: Today is EricVanWilderman's birthday!
16.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, EricVanWilderman, was born today in 1986.

17.title: Geometry Dash 1.2 is released.
17.desc: Geometry Dash 1.5 added the new level Cycles and the gravity ball game mode.

17.title: Demon Park is released.
17.desc: M2coL releases Demon Park, a level that would inspire RobTop to add the official Demon difficulty rating.

19.title: Wasureta is unrated.
19.desc: Wasureta is unrated on Crazen's account.

24.title: The Korean Forum, Geometry Dash World, is founded.
24.desc: Snow founds the popular Korean Forum, Geometry Dash World.

28.title: BrianTheBurger verifies Furious Flames.
28.desc: BrianTheBurger verifies Furious Flames by Failure444.

29.title: Smokes verifies Plasma Pulse Finale.
29.desc: Smokes verifies Plasma Pulse Finale, a popular Extreme Demon by himself and Giron.

29.title: Luqualizer verifies Silent Club.
29.desc: Luqualizer verifies the infamous Extreme Demon Silent Club.

29.title: Today is Knobbelboy's birthday!
29.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, Knobbelboy, was born today in 2001.

31.title: Anaban hacks RobTop.
31.desc: Anaban hacks RobTop's Geometry Dash account and deletes his level Spike Spike.

31.title: Riot beats Sonic Wave by Cyclic.
31.desc: Riot beats the infamous Extreme Demon Sonic Wave by Cyclic.

4.title: Hilo beats Celestial Force on mobile.
4.desc: Hilo completes the former top 10 Extreme Demon Celestial Force on mobile.

9.title: Geometry Dash 1.9 is released.
9.desc: Geometry Dash 1.9, widely regarded as Geometry Dash's Golden Age, was released.

11.title: Geometry Dash 2.11 is released.
11.desc: What was meant to be a small patch update before 2.2 would end up being the longest lasting update in Geometry Dash history.

11.title: SrGuillester becomes the first solo victor of Duelo Maestro.
11.desc: SrGuillester becomes the first solo victor of Duelo Maestro by Nacho21.

12.title: Today is Juniper's birthday!
12.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, Juniper, was born today in 2003.

13.title: The first ever Weekly Demon.
13.desc: Mechanical Showdown by Tongii becomes the first ever weekly demon.

13.title: Riot exposes top 1 leaderboard player NoctaFly.
13.desc: Riot publishes a video exposing NoctaFly.

18.title: Neptune releases Theory of Everything II v2.
18.desc: Neptume releases his infamous level Theory of Everything II v2.

18.title: Insendium releases Tetrix.
18.desc: At the time, Tetrix was the longest rated level in Geometry Dash.

20.title: Geometry Dash 1.3 is released.
20.desc: Geometry Dash 1.3 added xStep, the leaderboards, and the Demon rating.

21.title: NoctaFly confesses to hacking.
21.desc: Frormer top 1 leaderboard player, NoctaFly, confesses to hacking his achievements.

23.title: Crazen verifies Calculator Core.
23.desc: Calculator Core is an Extreme Demon remake of TeamN2's level Artificial Ideology.

25.title: Sunix verifies Sonic Wave by Cyclic.
25.desc: Sonic Wave, the hardest Extreme Demon at the time, was verified by Sunix.

26.title: The first ever Geometry Dash Awards Nominees.
26.desc: Viprin and Etzer release the first ever Geometry Dash Awards Nominees for update 2.0.

29.title: Tygrysek confesses to hacking Phobos.
29.desc: He then turns the original Phobos into a free demon while it was still rated.

29.title: Sea1997 releases the first ever G-News.
29.desc: G-News was a popular Geometry Dash news show at the time.

29.title: Riot verifies Galactic Machine.
29.desc: Riot verifies Galactic Machine by Komp.

2.title: The first ever Geometry Dash Awards Results.
2.desc: Viprin and Etzer release the first ever Geometry Dash Awards Results for update 2.0.

7.title: GeoStorm is founded by Weoweoteo.
7.desc: Weoweoteo founds the now famous Geometry Dash clan, GeoStorm.

8.title: Michigun quits Geometry Dash.
8.desc: The top 1 leaderboard player and now legend, Michigun, quits Geometry Dash.

8.title: Today is Trusta's birthday!
8.desc: The famous Geometry Dash YouTuber, Trusta, was born today in 1999.

8.title: Stilluetto verifies Khorne by Hota1991.
8.desc: At the time, Khorne had the most objects in any serious Geometry Dash level, having over one million.

9.title: Michigun is born.
9.desc: The legend himself was born today in 1996.

9.title: Sunix verifies Gamma by Mindcap.
9.desc: Gamma was one of Mindcap's first major projects.

11.title: Artificial Ascent is verified by Combined.
11.desc: Artificial Ascent by Viprin and more is verified by Combined.

14.title: Npesta verifies Kenos.
14.desc: After verifying the level, his reaction became a mainstream meme.

14.title: Riot uploaded the first version of the modern day Demon List.
14.desc: Riot uploaded the first ever version of the modern day Pointercrate Demon List to the Geometry Dash Forums.

14.title: Viprin premieres Prelude and the Geometry Dash 2.1 Awards Nominees.
14.desc: Viprin premieres Prelude, a Geometry Dash animation, along with the Geometry Dash 2.1 Awards Nominees.

19.title: Geometry Dash 2.2 is released.
19.desc: RobTop releases Geometry Dash 2.2 after nearly 7 years since update 2.1.

19.title: Geometry Dash Meltdown is released.
19.desc: RobTop releases the first ever Geometry Dash spin-off (excluding Geometry Dash Lite), Geometry Dash Meltdown!

19.title: Terron releases Reanimation.
19.desc: Terron releases his famous level Reanimation.

21.title: Geometry Dash SubZero is released.
21.desc: RobTop releases the third ever Geometry Dash spin-off (excluding Geometry Dash Lite), Geometry Dash SubZero!

21.title: Geometry Dash World is released.
21.desc: RobTop releases the second ever Geometry Dash spin-off (excluding Geometry Dash Lite), Geometry Dash World!

22.title: Geometry Dash is released on Steam.
22.desc: Geometry Dash finally branches off from only mobile devices and is introduced to PC players via Steam.

22.title: Knobbelboy verifies Astral Divinity.
22.desc: After getting a cease and disist for stolen assets in God Eater, he fixes the level and renames it Astral Divinity.

23.title: Spamdrew128 verifies SARY NEVER CLEAR.
23.desc: Spamdrew128 verifies SARY NEVER CLEAR, a remake of a level by the same name.

24.title: EricVanWilderman released his first Geometry Dash video.
24.desc: Now, EricVanWilderman is one of the most famous Geometry Dash YouTubers.

24.title: DiamondSplash verifies Spacial Rend
24.desc: Spacial Rend was a popular level at the time.

26.title: Geometry Dash 1.4 is released.
26.desc: Geometry Dash 1.4 added Clutterfunk and the mini mode.

27.title: Powerbomb verifies TeamN2's first level, The Hell Factory.
27.desc: Powerbomb verifies The Hell Factory, the first ever TeamN2 level.

27.title: SrGuillester verifies Hatred.
27.desc: SrGuillester verifies Hatred, a popular Extreme Demon from the time.

29.title: Viprin premieres the Geometry Dash 2.1 Awards Results.
29.desc: But little did everyone know, Geometry Dash 2.1 was still far from over.

29.title: SrGuillester cancels 211.
29.desc: SrGuillester cancels and deletes 2.11, a Geometry Dash level he was working on at the time.

30.title: Stormfly verifies The Hell Field.
30.desc: Stormfly verifies The Hell Field, a remake of a popular Extreme Demon by the same name.

31.title: Gablor verifies Kowareta.
31.desc: Gablor verifies Kowareta, a popular Extreme Demon.
